turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I want to order a drink from Peet's Coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am going to get a golden cafe latte, a medium one with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's at the peeps at 13307 Northeast Highway 99, Vancouver, Washington 98686.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it! one moment while i place that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a medium golden caffe latte with 2% milk to be picked up at the pete's on northwest highway 99 in vancouver washington.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds great. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 6 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, nothing else. Thank you. Bye.
